attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In regards to GBL which can be found in products such as "Nail Varnish Removal pads" made by such companies as The Jeyes Group Plc, and F.C.Paton Ltd Southport,I would like to see the substance Butyrolacetone, which when taken becomes "GBL",it is taken in a drink like some soft drink, we have been looking after this young lady Miss M.Tyhurst who is addicted to the above product, we would like to see the above taken out of the nail varnish and other similar beauty products, the Jeyes Group said they will later this month, but F.C.Paton ltd, will not do so,and show no concern over their product,been so harmfull 
We Would therefore ask the Government to arrange to have Butyrolactone,taken out of these products, as unfortunately quite a few people are addicted to it, and in my case Miss Tyhurst has only 10% use of her liver left,due to this substance
So I pled on her behalf and other like her ,for the government to help them, as young life is enought have lost, but it could be many more in the near future
signed  Keith Wadsworth.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
